title: So now that we have D.S. Thresh, Varus, Orianna, and Khazix...
body:
... it's time for a toplaner.

{{champion:83}} 

Imagine the "Dark Star Head" on the maiden. The ghouls. 

The black hole W. Throwing a wad of dark matter. 

The dark new VO... oh god it's like i've already bought it.

replies.body: How about Dark Star Shen? I feel like he'd fit in with the Dark star skin line. Also Shen needs more skins. ;-;

*ahem*
https://i.imgur.com/FYzb7hd.png
Wait... A Jhin skin idea centered on THREE people... not four... you heathen.
You missed Evelynn.
https://i.makeagif.com/media/8-08-2015/NVmPAW.gif
Well played, well played...
Shen fits way more with the Cosmic line. Dark Star Shen is like making a Star Guardian Pantheon. It just doesn't work.
it works much less than star guardian urgot, though.
Star Guardian Urgot works for ironic and sardonic reasons.
I mean, maybe he's overdue for a skin but other champs need it more. Yorick literally only has his release skins, and some champs like Swain haven't had a skin for multiple years.
Decent idea. Yorick needs more skin's

{{champion:136}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:83}} 

Would all make some wonderful Dark Star skins.
Dank Star Nasus

Dunk Star Darius


Oh wait...
Dank Star Darius
I'm still waiting for Farmer Nasus.
Hillbilly Nasus. Same skin line as Gragas.
May I add Janitor Master Yi to that skin line? Always shows up to clean up a fight.
Also goddamn {{champion:266}} would be beautiful as a Dark Star

> [{quoted}](name=theProjectionist,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PcnEohql,comment-id=000f0005,timestamp=2017-04-27T23:40:16.915+0000)
>
> Also goddamn {{champion:266}} would be beautiful as a Dark Star

who?
Academy line doesnt have one in each role tho
Yeah even with the faculty Academy is down a bot lane. But who was that in the hallway?
Hall monitor Taric beats you up with his hammer of justice

Caitlin is in a skirt so it'd be easier to make her into an academy skin.

Also School Nurse Sona/Soraka please.  It's about time Soraka got another human skin.
We haven't forgotten about Ward/Mara! It is sad though u_u
You guys have stated that you wouldn't stop a skinline at 5, so why not leave some at 4? {{champion:202}}
{{champion:13}} {{champion:114}} have somethings to say for {{champion:103}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:8}}  XD
Dark star vlad
I'm waiting on cosmic Rengar, we cant have dark star kha zix without cosmic rengar.

> [{quoted}](name=MistakenKing,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PcnEohql,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-04-27T05:22:33.019+0000)
>
> I'm waiting on cosmic Rengar, we cant have dark star kha zix without cosmic rengar.

It has to be an opposing skin for Rengo, star guardian rengo anyone?

im pretty sure cosmic reaver is the rival skin line and not star guardian 

since dark star skins have lines towards enemy cosmic skinline 

star guardian is just the sailor moon themed skin line tbh
Dark StarDunk Darius ^_^

"Dark Stardunkmaster Darius, the dunker of planets."

TOO EASY!! ~ {{champion:122}}
{{champion:17}}
Teemo's already got a crapton of skins, I don't know how much RIot could expect to make from yet another.
Dark Star Cho or Kench: the eater of worlds
Kench would be the best. Just make the heads that Varus and Kha'zix have and EEEEEEEENLARRRRGE!
Dark Star Yorick would be awesome. Other champs that could pull of sweet Dark Star skins are:{{champion:432}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:31}} and maybe rework {{champion:6}}
Urgot is getting a rework this season. I read it on a reddit leak that also talked in-depth about Xayah, Rakan, and the Zac/Sej/Maokai reworks before any of them were in the beta.
I'm aware of that. It's been known Urgot is the next VGU since before the leak.
Darkstar Illaoi please. She got just 1 skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Wtf that champ,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PcnEohql,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2017-04-27T20:11:10.952+0000)
>
> Darkstar Illaoi please. She got just 1 skin.

Waaaay too similar to Void Illaoi

Pretty much all the shadow isle's champions would look cool as dark star skins. 

{{champion:60}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:30}} would be amazing both visually, and their particles/themes would be epic (tangle the universe in a web/make constellations? Lead a galatic army? Blow up time and space?)

Idk if dark star {{champion:57}} would look good due to his lame particles in general, but it'd probably still be better than victorious maokai.
I think I'd rather see them with pre-transformation skins/voices.
Came here expecting a Yorick thread. I was not surprised.
Dark Star Yorick or Dark Star Aatrox. I'm sold on either one.
How do you know they're not working on that very legendary as we speak, and it'll be released with the new game mode?
Wow, never thought of Yorick fitting into the Darkstar theme but those ideas you mentioned sound epic. That would be an instabuy for me.
i was hoping this would be a yorick thread, noone remembers him. r.i.p
